text: wadhkru allah tsbyhana wtkbyrana fi 'ayaam qlayl, wahi 'ayam altshryq: alhadi eshr walththani eshr walththalith eshr min shahr dhi alhj. faman 'arad altejl wakharaj min "mina" qabl ghrwb shams alyawm althany eshr baed ramy aljummar fala dhanb elyh, waman ta'akhar bi'ana bat b "mina" hataa yarmi aljummar fi alyawm alththalith eshr fala dhanb elyh, liman atqa allah fi hjh. walta'akhur afdl; li'anah tzwwud fi alebadt waqtda' bifiel alnabiu salaa allah ealayh wslm. wkhafu allh- 'ayuha almslmwn- wraqbwh fi kl aemalkm, waelamuu 'anakum 'iilayh wahdah tuhsharwn baed mawtikum llhsab waljza'
